title: (4349) Brand New 3 Storied House in Nawala
details: Brand New 3 Storied House in Nawala, 5 Bed Rooms and a Study, 5 Bath Rooms with Granite Vanity tops and wide Shower Cubicles, Separate Laundry Room. fitted Pantry With oven Cook top, Granite Work top and Separate Kitchen, 3 Sitting areas, High Ceiling With Wood paneling, Solar Hot water and 3 Phase Electricity, Jack Wood, Exterior doors and Windows, 8 feet Parapet Wall. Garage With Roller Shutter, Exterior Veranda With Granite Tiling. Rs: 750 (Negotiable) 75 Million
